languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?" {n}Окинув быстрым взглядом ваше снаряжение, он понятливо кивает.{/n} "Ах, так вы, наверное, с корабля династии фон Валанциус! Станция авгур-наблюдения звездной гавани докладывала, что зафиксировала вход вашего корабля в нашу систему. А затем вы легли в дрейф, выслали шаттл на другой неопознанный корабль — очень, кстати, странный — и тот покинул наши края".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?" {n}Окинув быстрым взглядом ваше снаряжение, он понятливо кивает.{/n} "Ах, так вы, наверное, с корабля династии фон Валанциус! Станция ауспекс-наблюдения звездной гавани докладывала, что зафиксировала вход вашего корабля в нашу систему. А затем вы легли в дрейф, выслали шаттл на другой неопознанный корабль — очень, кстати, странный — и тот покинул наши края".

languages.text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}?" {n}Окинув быстрым взглядом ваше снаряжение, он понятливо кивает.{/n} "Ах, так вы, наверное, с корабля династии фон Валанциус! Станция авгур-наблюдения звездной гавани докладывала, что зафиксировала вход вашего корабля в нашу систему. А затем вы легли в дрейф, выслали шаттл на другой неопознанный корабль — очень, кстати, странный — и тот покинул наши края".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick eye over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station did report that it detected your ship entering the system. Then you hove to, sent a shuttle to another, unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

The starport's augur surveillance station did report that it detected your ship entering the system. Then you hove to, sent a shuttle to another, unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

The starport's augur surveillance station did report that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

"{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station did report that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

"A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

"A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}?" {n}Er mustert rasch deine Ausrüstung und nickt dann wissend.{/n} "Ah, dann kommt Ihr vom Schiff von Haus Valancius! Das Auguren-Überwachungssystem des Raumhafens hat gemeldet, dass Euer Schiff ins System gekommen ist. Dann habt Ihr beigedreht, ein Shuttle zu einem anderen, unbekannten Schiff geschickt — einem sehr seltsamen Schiff — und dann ist dieses andere Schiff abgereist."
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}?" {n}Er mustert rasch deine Ausrüstung und nickt dann wissend.{/n} "Ah, dann kommt Ihr vom Schiff von Haus Valancius! Das Auguren-Überwachungssystem des Raumhafens hat gemeldet, dass Euer Schiff ins System gekommen ist. Dann habt Ihr beigedreht, ein Shuttle zu einem anderen, unbekannten Schiff geschickt — einem sehr seltsamen Schiff — und dann ist dieses andere Schiff abgereist."

languages.text: « {mf|Un|Une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} ? » {n}Après avoir lancé un regard fugace vers votre équipement, il hoche la tête.{/n} « Je vois, vous devez venir du vaisseau de la maison von Valancius ! La station de surveillance augurale de l'astroport avait signalé l'entrée de votre vaisseau dans le système. Puis vous avez mis en panne, envoyé une navette vers un autre vaisseau non identifié - plutôt étrange, d'ailleurs -, puis ce vaisseau est parti. »
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un|Une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} ? » {n}Après avoir lancé un regard fugace vers votre équipement, il hoche la tête.{/n} « Je vois, vous devez venir du vaisseau de la maison von Valancius ! La station de surveillance augurale de l'astroport avait signalé l'entrée de votre vaisseau dans le système. Puis vous avez mis en panne, envoyé une navette vers un autre vaisseau non identifié - plutôt étrange, d'ailleurs -, puis ce vaisseau est parti. »

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？”{n}他匆匆扫了一眼你的装备，点头表示理解。{/n}“噢，您肯定是从冯·瓦兰修斯家族的船上来的！星港的扫描监测站报告说探测到您的飞船进入了这个星系。在那之后，您的飞船朝另一艘身份不明的飞船发射了一架穿梭机。之后，那艘古怪的飞船就带着穿梭机离开了。”
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？”{n}他匆匆扫了一眼你的装备，点头表示理解。{/n}“噢，您肯定是从冯·瓦兰修斯家族的船上来的！星港的扫描监测站报告说探测到您的飞船进入了这个星系。在那之后，您的飞船朝另一艘身份不明的飞船发射了一架穿梭机。之后，那艘古怪的飞船就带着穿梭机离开了。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}ですって？」{n}あなたの服装にちらりと目をやってから、青年は理解を示してうなずく。{/n}「ああ、ということはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の船でしたか！このスターポートのスキャン監視ステーションから、陛下の船が星系に入るのを検知したという報告を確かに受けました。それから進路を変え、シャトルを所属不明の…全く見慣れぬ船に送って…それからその船が出発したというわけですね」
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}ですって？」{n}あなたの服装にちらりと目をやってから、青年は理解を示してうなずく。{/n}「ああ、ということはフォン・ヴァランシウス家の船でしたか！このスターポートのスキャン監視ステーションから、閣下の船が星系に入るのを検知したという報告を確かに受けました。それから進路を変え、シャトルを所属不明の…全く見慣れぬ船に送ってあの船が出発したというわけですね」

languages.text: «¿{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?». {n}Tras echar un vistazo a tu equipo, asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Oh, así que debe ser de la nave de la casa von Valancius! La estación de vigilancia augur del puerto estelar informó que había detectado su nave entrando en el sistema. Luego se fue, envió un transbordador a otra nave no identificada, una muy extraña por cierto, y luego esa nave partió».
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

traits.locale_text: «¿{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?». {n}Tras echar un vistazo a tu equipo, asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Oh, así que debe ser de la nave de la casa von Valancius! La estación de vigilancia augur del puerto estelar informó que había detectado su nave entrando en el sistema. Luego se fue, envió un transbordador a otra nave no identificada, una muy extraña por cierto, y luego esa nave partió».

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} mi?" {n}Teçhizatına şöyle bir baktıktan sonra anlayarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin gemisinden geldiniz o zaman! Yıldız limanının alamet gözetleme istasyonu, geminizin sisteme girdiğini tespit ettiğini bildirmişti. Sonra durup tanımlanamayan, fazlasıyla garip başka bir gemiye mekik göndermişsiniz. O gemi de sırra kadem basmış."
languages.original_text: "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}?" {n}After casting a quick glance over your gear, he nods in understanding.{/n} "Oh, so you must be from House von Valancius's ship! The starport's augur surveillance station reported that it had detected your ship entering the system. Then you heaved to, sent a shuttle to another unidentified ship — a very strange one at that — and then that ship departed."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} mi?" {n}Teçhizatına şöyle bir baktıktan sonra anlayarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin gemisinden geldiniz o zaman! Yıldız limanının alamet gözetleme istasyonu, geminizin sisteme girdiğini tespit ettiğini bildirmişti. Sonra durup tanımlanamayan, fazlasıyla garip başka bir gemiye mekik göndermişsiniz. O gemi de sırra kadem basmış."
